name: Cold Blooded Murder
overview: Coded in Blitz Basic 2. Requires Kickstart 2.0 or higher. Simon Smith wanted to improve upon Extreme Violence from 1993 and I think he succeeded. With 2 to 5 players, 45 weapons and power-ups, 15 different arenas, options to configure tag teams, and gorgeous pixel art, this is one of the best of these multiplayer arena shooters on the Amiga.
